content: slip_stitch tweed pattern i used looks intricate but you are only working two rounds of each colour the slipped stitches make all the difference i have written out the 12 row repeating pattern below but you will find that you soon learn it by heart all even numbered rounds are plain knitting and on the odd numbered row the slipped stitches are slipped with the yarn at the back on one round and at the front on the next round 1 cream *k1 sl 1 pwise wyib repeat from * to end round 2 cream knit round 3 red *k1 sl 1 pwise wyif repeat from * to end round 4 red knit round 5 green *k1 sl 1 pwise wyib repeat from * to end round 6 green knit round 7 cream *k1 sl 1 pwise wyif repeat from * to end round 8 cream knit round 9 red *k1 sl 1 pwise wyib repeat from * to end round 10 red knit round 11 green *k1 sl 1 pwise wyif repeat from * to end round 12 green knit the cuff work 14 rounds in double moss stitch as for the basic stocking using green yarn and 4mm needles the leg i found that i needed to use 4 5mm / us size 7 needles to maintain the gauge while working the slip_stitch pattern so change to 4 5mm needles and knit one round in green then repeat the 12 row pattern given above until you have worked 102 row or the stocking measures 30 cm / 12 from the beginning the heel flap using 4mm needles and green work 20 row in stocking stitch as for the basic stocking picking up for the foot this part is fiddly involving cutting and rejoining the yarn several times to keep the pattern correct 1 using green and a 4 5mm needle knit the 26 heel stitches and pick up and knit 12 sts down the side of the heel cut yarn 2 using cream work pattern row 7 across the 40 instep sts cut yarn 3 rejoin green pick up and knit 12 sts up the other side of the heel and knit the next 38 sts cut yarn 4 rejoin cream and work pattern row 8 across the 40 instep sts from now on the pattern will be resumed across the whole round beginning with pattern row 9 and red yarn shaping the instep round 1 k1 work pattern row 9 to the last of the foot sts k1 continue in pattern across the 40 instep sts round 2 and all even numbered rounds k1 ssk k to the last 3 of the foot sts k2tog k1 knit the 40 instep sts round 3 work pattern row 11 across the round round 5 k1 work pattern row 1 to the last of the foot sts k1 continue in pattern across the 40 instep sts round 7 work pattern row 3 across the round round 9 k1 work pattern
